'''1.20.2 Pre-Release 4''' (known as '''1.20.2-pre4''' in the launcher) is the fourth and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.20.2]], released on September 13, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-20-2-pre-release-4|Minecraft 1.20.2 Pre-Release 4|September 13, 2023}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Tag]]'''
* Added the following damage type tag:
** {{cd|#always_kills_armor_stands}}: contains {{cd|d=and|arrow|trident|mob_projectile|fireball|wither_skull}}.
*** Damage types included in this tag should always kill an [[armor stand]].
